snippet.title: The Pirate Queen - A Forgotten Legend | Behind The Scenes with Eloise Singer and Lucy Liu
snippet.description:
🎬 Behind the Scenes with Exec Producers Eloise Singer and Lucy Liu - Crafting The Pirate Queen: A Forgotten Legend 🎬

Get ready to dive into the story of "The Pirate Queen: A Forgotten Legend"! Join us as executive producers Eloise Singer and Lucy Liu take you behind the curtain, to get a glimpse at the story behind this multi-award winning VR Adventure Game.


────────────────────────────────────────────────────

"Everything has narrowed down to a single night, where only one of us will emerge victorious."

Prepare to set sail as The Pirate Queen.

────────────────────────────────────────────────────

🏆 Multi-Award Winning VR Adventure Game 

Get ready to embark on an unparalleled journey as "The Pirate Queen: A Forgotten Legend" takes center stage. This highly anticipated VR adventure is set to release on Quest 2 & Steam in early 2024. 

Don't miss your chance to be part of history - Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2469330/The_Pirate_Queen_A_Forgotten_Legend/

 Developed by Singer Studios | Directed by Eloise Singer | Voiced by Lucy Liu 

────────────────────────────────────────────────────

ABOUT THE PIRATE QUEEN VR GAME

Uncover the Epic Tale:
Step into the shoes of the legendary Pirate Queen and engage in a high-stakes rivalry with Kwok Po Dai. Your mission: outwit, outmaneuver, and claim your place as the leader of the pirate fleet before daybreak.

Conquer the Challenges:
Descend into the heart of a 19th-century pirate ship, face venomous sea creatures, and embark on a daring stealth mission aboard your rival's ship.

Navigate the Perils:
Test your agility as you navigate a labyrinthine course of sampan boats, showcasing your wit and skill.

Experience an Epic Finale:
Prepare to make decisions that will forever shape the destiny of the Pirate Queen.

🌟 Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/TPQSteam
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/singerstudiosuk/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SingerStudiosUK/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SingerStudiosUK/
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@singerstudiosuk

🔔 Subscribe for Exclusive Updates: https://www.singerstudios.co.uk/work/thepiratequeenforgottenlegend

Join us on this epic journey as we unveil a legend that defied the odds. Wishlist now and be part of history in the making!
